That is totally OK and we will treat you as a Delivery Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In 2007, EPAM started their relationship with Wolters Kluwer. This relationship has resulted in the development of numerous software solutions in Business Information area and steep growth of EPAM's competency in developing the so-called “Information” accounts. Clients, who use Information as Foundation of their Business – Legal Information, Market Data, Healthcare Information, Educational Publishers, Print Publishers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"However, nowadays most information companies turned into global data insights factories where EPAM unique competencies in managing information to make it a solid basis for the business decision is highly valued.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Following EPAM's naming tradition based on the geography of accounts, we were called East3 BU, meaning our accounts are concentrated in North America's eastern side. But with our growth, we are becoming a business unit working with geographically widely distributed global accounts.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business
